scripts.datastore:start: nohup gcloud beta emulators datastore start --no-store-on-disk &
scripts.datastore:stop: for pid in $(ps -aef | grep cloud-datastore-emulator/CloudDatastore.jar | awk '{ print $2 }'); do kill -2 $pid; done; yarn datastore:unset-env
scripts.test: yarn datastore:start; yarn datastore:set-env; NODE_ENV=test jest --env node; yarn datastore:stop
scripts.update-index: export $(egrep -v '^#' $PWD/.env | xargs); gcloud datastore indexes create $PWD/index.yaml --project=$PROJECT
scripts.deploy: export $(egrep -v '^#' $PWD/.env | xargs); gcloud functions deploy niu --env-vars-file .env.yml --trigger-http --runtime nodejs10 --region europe-west1 --project $PROJECT
